price: 75. (Khadir) wuxuu yidhi: Miyaanan kugu odhan: Adigu ma kareysid la jirkeyga samir?
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
